context.description: Select this check box to hide the option of generating a Web service client when you right-click a file in the Project Explorer or Navigator.

Select this check box to hide the option of generating skeleton Java classes when you right-click a file in the Project Explorer or Navigator. The skeleton bean contains a set of methods that correspond to the operations described in the WSDL document. When the bean is created, each method has a trivial implementation that you replace by editing the bean.
Select this check box to hide the option of publishing the Web service's WSDL file to a UDDI registry when you right-click a file in the Project Explorer or Navigator.
